session.title: Welcome to GulfPCR Valves 2023
session.introduction: This session serves as an introduction to the GulfPCR Valves 2023 event, setting the stage for the upcoming discussions and presentations on the latest advancements in transcatheter aortic valve interventions (TAVI). The session objectives, topics, and interventions are not provided, indicating that this is a general welcome and orientation for the conference attendees.
session.meta_description: This introductory session sets the stage for the GulfPCR Valves 2023 event, providing an overview of the upcoming discussions and presentations on the latest advancements in transcatheter aortic valve interventions (TAVI).
session.teaser_title: Dive into the Latest TAVI Advancements at GulfPCR Valves 2023
session.teaser_text: Get ready to explore the cutting-edge developments in transcatheter aortic valve interventions (TAVI) at the GulfPCR Valves 2023 conference. This introductory session sets the stage for the upcoming discussions and presentations.

session.title: TAVI for bicuspid aortic stenosis patients

objectives.objective: To understand which patients with bicuspid aortic valve are good candidates for TAVI
To review the current sizing options in bicuspid aortic valve anatomy
To share technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI procedure outcome in patients with bicuspid aortic valve

intervention.title: Imaging analysis and review of current sizing methods for bicuspid aortic valve
TAVI in a bicuspid aortic valve patient with large anatomy

session.introduction: This session focuses on the use of TAVI (Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation) in patients with bicuspid aortic valve stenosis. The key objectives are to understand which patients with bicuspid aortic valve are good candidates for TAVI, review the current sizing options in bicuspid aortic valve anatomy, and share technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI procedure outcomes in this patient population. The session will include discussions, case presentations, imaging analysis, and a recorded case demonstration to provide a comprehensive overview of the topic.
session.meta_description: Explore the use of TAVI in patients with bicuspid aortic valve stenosis, including understanding patient selection, reviewing sizing options, and learning technical tips to optimize TAVI procedures in this challenging anatomy.
session.teaser_title: Mastering TAVI for Bicuspid Aortic Stenosis: Insights and Techniques
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest insights and techniques for using TAVI in patients with bicuspid aortic valve stenosis. This session will cover patient selection, sizing options, and procedural optimization to help you deliver the best outcomes for this challenging patient population.

session.title: TAVI and access: alternating is wise

objectives.objective: To know why to use alternative access
To learn which alternative to choose for my patient
To know how to do it

session.introduction: This session focuses on the importance of using alternative access approaches for TAVI procedures, beyond the traditional femoral access. The key objectives are to understand why alternative access should be used, learn which alternative access options are available (such as subclavian, carotid, and percutaneous axillary access), and know how to effectively perform these alternative access techniques. The session will include discussions, presentations on various alternative access options, and audience interaction to provide a comprehensive understanding of this topic.
session.meta_description: Explore the use of alternative access approaches for TAVI procedures, including subclavian, carotid, and percutaneous axillary access. Learn why and how to effectively utilize these alternative access techniques to optimize TAVI outcomes.
session.teaser_title: Beyond Femoral Access: Mastering Alternative TAVI Approaches
session.teaser_text: Discover the importance of using alternative access options for TAVI procedures and learn how to effectively perform these techniques, including subclavian, carotid, and percutaneous axillary access. Expand your TAVI toolkit to deliver the best outcomes for your patients.

session.title: Newer generation self-expanding platform: technical optimisation for common clinical challenges
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Medtronic

objectives.objective: To discuss challenges in TAVI procedural planning
To discuss valve choice in challenging anatomies
To learn more about optimization of valve deployment

intervention.title: Discuss therapeutic options and selected therapy for this patient

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Medtronic, focuses on the technical optimization of newer generation self-expanding TAVI platforms to address common clinical challenges. The key objectives are to discuss challenges in TAVI procedural planning, explore valve choice in challenging anatomies, and learn more about the optimization of valve deployment. The session will include case presentations, discussions of therapeutic options, and audience interaction to provide insights into the effective use of these advanced TAVI technologies.
session.meta_description: Explore the technical optimization of newer generation self-expanding TAVI platforms to address common clinical challenges. Gain insights into procedural planning, valve selection, and deployment techniques to help you deliver the best outcomes for your patients.
session.teaser_title: Overcoming TAVI Challenges with Newer Generation Self-Expanding Platforms
session.teaser_text: Discover how to technically optimize the use of newer generation self-expanding TAVI platforms to address common clinical challenges. Learn about procedural planning, valve selection, and deployment techniques to enhance your TAVI outcomes.

session.title: Essentials of lifetime management of TAVR patients using novel Myval THV
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Meril

objectives.objective: To learn about the novel Myval next generation THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits and learn about the clinical data in a vast cohort of patient population
To understand the CorAlign technique which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment thus preserving coronary access
To understand the technique of precise sizing, positioning and deployment of Myval THV

intervention.title: Introduction to novel Myval balloon expandable THV and St. Barts experience on XL sizes
Clinical experience with novel Myval THV in Saudi Arabia

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Meril, focuses on the essentials of lifetime management of TAVR (Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement) patients using the novel Myval Transcatheter Heart Valve (THV) technology. The key objectives are to learn about the Myval THV features, procedural and clinical benefits, and the CorAlign technique for predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment. The session will include an introduction to the Myval THV, a recorded case demonstration, and clinical experiences to provide a comprehensive understanding of this novel TAVR technology and its lifetime management considerations.
session.meta_description: Explore the essentials of lifetime management for TAVR patients using the novel Myval Transcatheter Heart Valve (THV) technology. Learn about the key features, procedural and clinical benefits, and the CorAlign technique for precise valve deployment and coronary preservation.
session.teaser_title: Optimizing Lifetime Management with the Myval THV: A Novel TAVR Solution
session.teaser_text: Discover the essentials of lifetime management for TAVR patients using the innovative Myval Transcatheter Heart Valve (THV) technology. Learn about its key features, procedural and clinical benefits, and the CorAlign technique for precise valve deployment and coronary preservation.

session.title: Evidence gap and new indications

objectives.objective: To discuss indications for TAVI for which there is not clear evidence
To evaluate treatment indications for patients with asymptomatic aortic stenosis
To learn about new options for patients with pure aortic regurgitation

intervention.title: A case of moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis
Evidence gaps in the treatment of aortic stenosis
A case of pure aortic regurgitation
New treatment options for patients with aortic regurgitation

session.introduction: This session explores the indications for TAVI where there is a lack of clear evidence, as well as evaluating treatment options for patients with asymptomatic aortic stenosis and new approaches for those with pure aortic regurgitation. It covers a case of moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis, discusses the evidence gaps in aortic stenosis treatment, and presents a case of pure aortic regurgitation along with new treatment options. The session aims to provide insights and facilitate audience discussions to enhance understanding of these complex clinical scenarios.
session.meta_description: Explore indications for TAVI with unclear evidence, treatment options for asymptomatic aortic stenosis, and new approaches for pure aortic regurgitation. Gain insights through case discussions and audience interactions.
session.teaser_title: Navigating the Evidence Gaps in Aortic Valve Interventions
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest on TAVI indications with unclear evidence, treatment for asymptomatic aortic stenosis, and new options for pure aortic regurgitation. Engage in interactive case discussions to enhance your understanding of these complex clinical scenarios.

session.title: Valve-in-valve: not as simple as it looks

objectives.objective: To appreciate the principles of valve selection for initial and subsequent procedures
To improve your understanding of how to anticipate, plan and perform a TAV-in-TAV procedure
To understand how to prevent coronary obstruction

intervention.title: Sapien 3 valve in degenerated evolute valve

session.introduction: This session delves into the complexities of valve-in-valve (TAV-in-TAV) procedures, emphasizing the importance of proper valve selection, planning, and execution to prevent complications such as coronary obstruction. It covers specific cases, including a Sapien 3 valve implanted in a degenerated Evolute valve and an Evolute valve in a degenerated Sapien valve, with interactive discussions to improve understanding of these challenging scenarios.
session.meta_description: Explore the principles of valve selection, planning, and execution for TAV-in-TAV procedures to prevent complications like coronary obstruction. Gain insights through case-based discussions.
session.teaser_title: Mastering the Intricacies of Valve-in-Valve Procedures
session.teaser_text: Discover the key considerations for valve selection, planning, and execution in TAV-in-TAV procedures to ensure successful outcomes and prevent complications like coronary obstruction.

session.title: From access to annulus: overcoming challenging anatomies
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to select your TAVI device in order to achieve stable deployment in 90 degrees horizontal aorta
To witness smooth deliverabilty even crossing tight and tortous anatomy
To be ready for future coronary access regardless of the height of left or right coronaries

intervention.title: Case 1: recorded case (TAVI case with Navitor with FlexNav system)

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on navigating challenging anatomies during TAVI procedures. It covers how to select the appropriate TAVI device to achieve stable deployment in a 90-degree horizontal aorta, ensure smooth deliverability even in tight and tortuous anatomy, and maintain future coronary access regardless of the height of the left or right coronaries. The session includes the presentation of two recorded TAVI cases, one using the Navitor device with the FlexNav system, to demonstrate the practical application of these techniques.
session.meta_description: Explore strategies for selecting the right TAVI device and techniques to overcome challenging anatomies, including stable deployment in a 90-degree horizontal aorta, smooth deliverability in tight and tortuous anatomy, and preserving future coronary access. Learn from case presentations.
session.teaser_title: Conquering Complex Anatomies in TAVI: From Access to Annulus
session.teaser_text: Discover how to select the optimal TAVI device and employ specialized techniques to navigate challenging anatomies, ensuring stable deployment, smooth deliverability, and preserving future coronary access.

session.title: Learning how to manage TAVI complications

objectives.objective: To understand how to predict major TAVI complication
To know how to evaluate critical TAVI complications
To learn how to treat TAVI complications

session.introduction: This session focuses on understanding, evaluating, and managing major TAVI complications. It aims to help participants learn how to predict, assess, and treat critical TAVI-related complications, drawing on real-world experiences and best practices. The session will cover various aspects of TAVI complication management, equipping attendees with the knowledge and skills to handle these complex scenarios effectively.
session.meta_description: Gain insights into predicting, evaluating, and treating major TAVI complications. Learn how to effectively manage critical TAVI-related issues based on real-world experiences and best practices.
session.teaser_title: Mastering TAVI Complication Management
session.teaser_text: Explore strategies to predict, assess, and treat major TAVI complications. Enhance your skills in managing critical TAVI-related issues based on real-world case studies and expert guidance.

session.teaser_title: Wrapping Up the Insights: Consolidating the Key Learnings
session.teaser_text: Explore the essential takeaways from the event, synthesizing the knowledge gained across the sessions to empower you in applying the acquired insights in your clinical practice.

objectives.objective: To learn how to select the patient for left main PCI

To discuss the role of imaging in stenting

intervention.title: Strategic and technical discussion of the LIVE Case

LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia

session.introduction: This session focuses on left main PCI, providing attendees with the opportunity to learn from a LIVE case performed at the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The session aims to educate participants on patient selection, the best techniques to use, and the role of imaging in stenting. Attendees will gain valuable insights into the strategic and technical aspects of the LIVE case, as well as engage in discussions with experts to enhance their understanding of this complex procedure.
session.meta_description: Discover the latest techniques and strategies for left main PCI through a LIVE case from the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Explore patient selection, imaging guidance, and expert discussions to optimize your approach to this complex procedure.
session.teaser_title: Mastering Left Main PCI: Insights from a LIVE Case
session.teaser_text: Join this session to learn from a LIVE case of left main PCI performed at the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Gain insights into patient selection, best techniques, and the role of imaging to optimize your approach to this complex procedure.

session.title: OCT ready for your PCI in the cathlab
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to be OCT ready everyday in your cathlab
To learn MLD-MAX algorithm and use of AI to perform PCI
To discuss OCT image interpretation on an interactive session with experts

intervention.title: Image Acquisition A-Z for OCT in the cath lab
MLD MAX for OCT step by step and image interpretation
Tips and tricks for being OCT ready anytime

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on the use of Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) in the cathlab. Attendees will learn how to be OCT-ready every day in their cathlab, including the step-by-step MLD-MAX algorithm and the use of AI to perform PCI. The session will also include an interactive discussion on OCT image interpretation, with experts providing guidance and insights to enhance the participants' understanding and application of this advanced imaging technology.
session.meta_description: Discover how to be OCT-ready in your cathlab every day. Learn the MLD-MAX algorithm and the use of AI to perform PCI, as well as expert guidance on OCT image interpretation to optimize your interventional approach.
session.teaser_title: Elevate Your PCI with OCT: Insights from the Cathlab
session.teaser_text: Explore how to be OCT-ready in your cathlab, including the MLD-MAX algorithm and the use of AI to perform PCI. Engage with experts on OCT image interpretation to enhance your interventional approach.

session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to use novel AI OCT features in complex clinical scenarios
To learn how streamline decisions based on OCT images to optimize stent results
To enhance your experience in OCT image interpretation interacting with advanced technological platform and experts

intervention.title: Dealing with complex procedures: real world step by step imaging guidance
Key OCT findings that make the difference
Actionable imaging to optimize decisions in various coronary settings (LM, true bifurcation, severe calcification, diffuse disease, ISR)

session.introduction: This session, also sponsored by Abbott, focuses on using novel AI-powered OCT features to navigate complex clinical scenarios. Attendees will learn how to streamline decision-making based on OCT images to optimize stent results. The session will feature a hands-on lab experience, where participants can interact with advanced technological platforms and experts to enhance their skills in OCT image interpretation and application in various coronary settings, such as left main, true bifurcation, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis.
session.meta_description: Discover how to leverage novel AI-powered OCT features to navigate complex clinical scenarios. Learn to streamline decision-making and optimize stent results through hands-on experience and expert guidance in OCT image interpretation.

session.teaser_text: Explore how to use AI-powered OCT features to tackle complex clinical scenarios. Gain hands-on experience and expert guidance in streamlining decision-making and optimizing stent results through OCT image interpretation.

session.title: Challenging scenarios in cardiogenic shock
session.subtitle: With the collaboration of the Saudi Arabian Cardiac Intervention Society (SACIS)

objectives.objective: To learn physiology and stages of cardiogenic shock
To learn different modalities in treating cardiogenic shock
To learn how to manage a patient undergoing high-risk PCI with cardiogenic shock

intervention.title: Case 1 - Left main with cardiogenic shock
Case 2 - Cardiogenic shock in setting of multivessel disease

session.introduction: This session delves into the management of cardiogenic shock, a life-threatening condition where the heart is unable to pump sufficient blood to meet the body's needs. The session covers the physiology and stages of cardiogenic shock, and explores different modalities for treating this critical situation. Through a series of case studies, the speakers demonstrate how to manage patients undergoing high-risk PCI while in cardiogenic shock. Attendees will learn essential tips and tricks to tackle these challenging scenarios, including the use of ECMO support during complex PCI procedures. The session aims to equip healthcare professionals with the knowledge and skills to provide optimal care for patients in cardiogenic shock.
session.meta_description: Explore the management of cardiogenic shock, including the physiology, stages, and different treatment modalities. Learn essential tips and tricks to tackle challenging scenarios through case-based discussions, including the use of ECMO support during complex PCI.
session.teaser_title: Challenging scenarios in cardiogenic shock
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest insights on managing cardiogenic shock, a life-threatening condition where the heart is unable to pump sufficient blood. Explore different treatment modalities and learn essential tips and tricks to tackle these challenging scenarios through case-based discussions.

session.title: Challenging scenarios in STEMI patients
session.subtitle: With the collaboration of the Emirates Cardiac Society and the Iraqi Cardio-Thoracic Society

objectives.objective: To discuss challenges during difficult STEMI scenarios
To learn best tips and tricks to tackle challenging STEMI cases
To be innovative and think outside the box

intervention.title: Case 1 - STEMI in a patient with left main stem disease
Case 3 - STEMI in a patient with previous stent
Case 4 - STEMI aberrant right coronary artery

session.introduction: This session focuses on addressing the challenges encountered during difficult STEMI (ST-Elevation Myocardial Infarction) scenarios. The speakers present a series of complex STEMI cases, including patients with left main stem disease, crossroads in primary STEMI, STEMI in a patient with previous stent, and STEMI with an aberrant right coronary artery. Attendees will learn best tips and tricks to tackle these challenging STEMI cases, and explore innovative approaches to think outside the box. The session aims to equip healthcare professionals with the knowledge and skills to provide optimal care for STEMI patients, even in the most complex and difficult situations.
session.meta_description: Explore challenging STEMI scenarios, including patients with left main stem disease, crossroads in primary STEMI, STEMI in a patient with previous stent, and STEMI with an aberrant right coronary artery. Learn best tips and tricks to tackle these complex cases and discover innovative approaches to provide optimal care for STEMI patients.
session.teaser_title: Challenging scenarios in STEMI patients
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest insights on addressing the challenges encountered during difficult STEMI scenarios. Learn best tips and tricks to tackle complex STEMI cases and explore innovative approaches to provide optimal care for STEMI patients.

session.introduction: This session focuses on challenging structural interventions, featuring selected case submissions from the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference. The session includes a discussion on TAVI (Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation) in extremely complex bicuspid aortic valve anatomy, as well as the treatment strategy for structural dysfunction of TAVI implanted to treat surgical aortic valve replacement failure. Attendees will have the opportunity to engage in discussions and interact with the presenters to gain insights into the management of these complex structural interventions.
session.meta_description: Explore challenging structural interventions, including TAVI in complex bicuspid aortic valve anatomy and the treatment strategy for structural dysfunction of TAVI implanted to treat surgical aortic valve replacement failure. Engage in discussions and interact with presenters to gain insights into the management of these complex cases.

session.title: Left main stenting: one vs. two stent strategy
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: How imaging changed my decision in left main bifurcation
One up rest down: STEMI with cardiogenic syndrome (left main equivalent disease)
ACS in a middle-aged female with cervical cancer - A CHIP case

session.introduction: This session explores the decision-making process between a one-stent versus a two-stent strategy for left main bifurcation lesions. The session includes several case presentations that demonstrate how imaging can influence the treatment approach, as well as discussions on the management of STEMI with cardiogenic syndrome (left main equivalent disease) and ACS in a middle-aged female with cervical cancer. Attendees will have the opportunity to engage in discussions and interact with the presenters to gain insights into the optimal management of left main bifurcation lesions.
session.meta_description: Explore the decision-making process between a one-stent versus a two-stent strategy for left main bifurcation lesions. Discover how imaging can influence the treatment approach, and engage in discussions on the management of complex cases, including STEMI with cardiogenic syndrome and ACS in a middle-aged female with cervical cancer.
session.teaser_title: Left main stenting: one vs. two stent strategy
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest insights on the decision-making process between a one-stent versus a two-stent strategy for left main bifurcation lesions. Engage in discussions on the management of complex cases and learn how imaging can influence the treatment approach.

session.title: How artificial intelligence can help in optimising PCI for treatment of complex lesions
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how artificial intelligence with OCT simplifies procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast
To understand value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology in optimising patient outcomes
To know the impact of DES platform in the management of a complex patient

intervention.title: Key objectives, strategy, tools and techniques
LIVE Case from Mohammed Bin Khalifa Bin Salman Al Khalifa Specialist Cardiac Centre - Awali, Bahrain
DAPT for patients with complex PCI and high bleeding risk patients
How artificial intelligence simplifies procedural strategy and provides actionable insights for complex PCI

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, explores how artificial intelligence (AI) with optical coherence tomography (OCT) can simplify procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast, and optimize patient outcomes in the management of complex lesions. The session covers the value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology in guiding treatment decisions, as well as the impact of drug-eluting stent (DES) platforms in the management of complex patients. Attendees will have the opportunity to observe a live case from the Mohammed Bin Khalifa Bin Salman Al Khalifa Specialist Cardiac Centre in Bahrain, and engage in discussions on the role of AI in complex PCI and the management of patients with high bleeding risk.
session.meta_description: Discover how artificial intelligence (AI) with optical coherence tomography (OCT) can simplify procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast, and optimize patient outcomes in the management of complex lesions. Explore the value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology, as well as the impact of DES platforms, in the management of complex patients.
session.teaser_title: How artificial intelligence can help in optimising PCI for treatment of complex lesions
session.teaser_text: Explore how artificial intelligence (AI) with OCT can simplify procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast, and optimize patient outcomes in the management of complex lesions. Discover the value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology, and the impact of DES platforms, in the management of complex patients.

session.title: Next-generation complex PCI toolkit and novel balloon expandable Myval THV
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Meril

objectives.objective: To understand novel tools and techniques for effective management of bifurcation lesions and long diffused lesions using dedicated stenting solutions
To learn about the novel Myval next generation THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits and learn about the clinical data in a vast cohort of patient population
To understand the CorAlign technique which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment thus preserving coronary access
To understand the technique of precise sizing, positioning and deployment of Myval THV

intervention.title: Managing complex lesions and emergence of metal-free PCI with next generation thin strut BRS
Tapered vessels need tapered stenting solutions
Myval THV design philosophy with compare TAVI and landmark randomized clinical trial update
Extending treatment opportunities in pulmonary valve interventions
Myval THV case kaleidoscope | Easy access, precise positioning, accurate deployment, intuitive coronary alignment

session.introduction: This session provides a comprehensive overview of the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary lesions, including bifurcation and long, diffuse lesions. It introduces the novel Myval next-generation transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology, highlighting its key features, procedural benefits, and clinical data from a vast patient population. The session also covers the CorAlign technique, which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment, preserving coronary access. Attendees will gain insights into the optimal sizing, positioning, and deployment of the Myval THV, as well as learn about the technique of precise sizing, positioning, and deployment of this novel THV technology.
session.meta_description: Discover the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary lesions, including bifurcation and long, diffuse lesions. Learn about the novel Myval next-generation transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology, its key features, procedural benefits, and clinical data. Understand the CorAlign technique for predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment, preserving coronary access.
session.teaser_title: Next-generation complex PCI toolkit and novel balloon expandable Myval THV
session.teaser_text: Gain insights into the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary lesions, the novel Myval next-generation transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology, and the CorAlign technique for predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment.

session.introduction: This session features a selection of complex bifurcation PCI cases from the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference. It includes a range of challenging cases, such as PCI to a trifurcation left main, a rocky bifurcated lesion, a bifurcation PCI case, a DK nano crush for bifurcation stenting, and a complex PCI in a case of previously operated open mitral valvotomy. Each case is presented, followed by a discussion and audience interaction, allowing attendees to learn from the experiences and insights shared by the presenters.

session.introduction: This session features a selection of complex chronic total occlusion (CTO) PCI cases from the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference. It includes cases with various challenges, such as a "blind game" using IVUS to unmask the CTO, the challenge of antegrade CTO PCI guided by ipsilateral collaterals, dealing with complexities in CTO, extreme measures to overcome an uncrossable CTO lesion, interventional management of only wire crossable coronary lesion, and a complex CTO case. Each case is presented, followed by a discussion and audience interaction, allowing attendees to learn from the experiences and insights shared by the presenters.

Left ventricular function recovery after PCI for CTO

session.introduction: This session features a selection of abstracts presented at the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference. The topics covered include PCI of non-ST-elevation myocardial infarction (NSTEMI) in the Kurdistan region of Iraq, predictors and impact of myocardial injury (VARC-3 criteria) after transcatheter aortic valve replacement (TAVR), clinical outcomes of the POT (Proximal Optimization Technique) in bifurcation stenting, the diagnostic accuracy of strain imaging echocardiography for predicting the severity of coronary artery disease in non-ST-elevation acute coronary syndrome, endovascular aneurysm repair (EVAR) and thoracic endovascular aortic repair (TEVAR) using minimal contrast media, and left ventricular function recovery after PCI for chronic total occlusion (CTO). Each abstract is presented, followed by a discussion and audience interaction.
session.meta_description: Explore a selection of abstracts presented at the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference, covering topics such as PCI of NSTEMI, predictors and impact of myocardial injury after TAVR, clinical outcomes of the POT in bifurcation stenting, the diagnostic accuracy of strain imaging echocardiography for predicting the severity of CAD in NSTEACS, EVAR and TEVAR using minimal contrast media, and left ventricular function recovery after PCI for CTO. Engage in discussions and learn from the presenters' findings.

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on the use of novel AI-powered OCT features to navigate complex clinical scenarios. Experts will demonstrate how to streamline decision-making based on OCT images to optimize stent results, with a particular emphasis on left main, true bifurcation, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis cases. Participants will have the opportunity to interact with an advanced technological platform and experts to enhance their experience in OCT image interpretation and its practical application.
session.meta_description: Explore the use of novel AI-powered OCT features to navigate complex clinical scenarios, including left main, true bifurcation, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis cases. Learn how to streamline decision-making based on OCT images to optimize stent results, and interact with experts to enhance your OCT image interpretation skills.
session.teaser_title: How to make simple complex cases. Hands on lab in OCT
session.teaser_text: Discover how to leverage novel AI-powered OCT features to navigate complex clinical scenarios and streamline decision-making to optimize stent results. Interact with experts and an advanced technological platform to enhance your OCT image interpretation skills.

session.title: Challenging cases – Best case submissions
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: Severe chest pain and shock in young female
Iatrogenic left main coronary artery type F dissection
Mechanical mitral valve thrombosis, can we treat it by catheter intervention?
Refractory ascites - From internal medicine to interventional cardiology

session.introduction: This session features a selection of complex and intriguing clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023. Dive into discussions around a young female patient presenting with severe chest pain and shock, an iatrogenic left main coronary artery type F dissection, mechanical mitral valve thrombosis treated with catheter intervention, a case of refractory ascites transitioning from internal medicine to interventional cardiology, and a rotablation procedure narrowly avoiding a nightmare scenario. Engage with the presenters and audience as they share their insights and approaches to managing these challenging cases.
session.meta_description: Explore a selection of complex clinical cases from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, including a young female with severe chest pain and shock, an iatrogenic left main dissection, mechanical mitral valve thrombosis, refractory ascites, and a rotablation procedure.
session.teaser_title: Challenging cases – Best case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023
session.teaser_text: Dive into discussions around complex and intriguing clinical cases, including a young female with severe chest pain, an iatrogenic left main dissection, mechanical mitral valve thrombosis, refractory ascites, and a rotablation procedure.

session.title: GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Closing Ceremony
session.introduction: The GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Closing Ceremony marks the end of the conference, celebrating the achievements and learnings from the event. This session provides an opportunity to reflect on the key highlights, takeaways, and future directions for the field of cardiovascular interventions and therapies. Attendees can expect a fitting conclusion to the conference, with the potential for special addresses, awards, and a look ahead to upcoming PCR initiatives and events.
session.meta_description: The GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Closing Ceremony marks the end of the conference, celebrating the achievements and learnings from the event. Reflect on the key highlights, takeaways, and future directions for cardiovascular interventions and therapies.
